reason: Question asks how to respond to public complaints (민원) about this form - topic not addressed in source at all. Answer dumps source content without addressing complaint handling. Also incomplete: only lists exclusion items 1-5, omitting 6-8.
Duplicate answer - identical to q_1_1218. Also incomplete: exclusion list truncated at item 5, omitting items 6-8 that exist in the source.
Duplicate of q_1_1210 series from batch_0060 (same source section 7, same answer structure). Vague question about 특이사항/예외 규정 not specifically addressed by the answer.
Question asks about recent regulatory changes (최근에 어떻게 바뀌었나요) but answer contains no information about changes or revisions. Just dumps current content. Question-answer mismatch.
Raw dump pulling from multiple sections (4(3), 5, 6 on page 94). Exclusion list truncated at item 2, omitting items 3-8. Incomplete answer for a question requesting 모든 규정 (all regulations).
Duplicate answer - identical to q_1_1224. Question asks how 심사서 applies within the 공적 요약서 process but answer does not explain their relationship. Question-answer mismatch.

Clear specific question about pre-period application. Answer accurately identifies 중병자 exception, 진단서(원본) requirement, verification by 교감/장학사 without separate signature. All verified against page 95 section 8.

Clear question about special procedure for seriously ill applicants. Answer accurately covers 진단서 원본 submission, verification by 교감 and 장학사 (별도 서명/날인 안 함), and difference from general applicants. All verified against page 95.

Extreme hallucination and padding. Source only states 3 brief points about 중병자, but answer fabricates: specific 정기 신청 timelines (2월/8월), 진단서 내용 requirements (중증도, 치료기간), 발급기관 (종합병원), 중병의 범위 commentary, 악용 방지, 위조 방지 - none present in source page 95.

Extreme padding with hallucinated details beyond source. Core 3 conditions for 사립학교 교장 are accurate, but fabricates: 재직 20년 이상 requirement (not on page 95), 형식적 조항만으로는 불충분, 관할청 인가, specific 진단서 content requirements. Source page 95 section 9 is much simpler than the bloated answer.
